agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Defense & Veterans' Affairs TIME & DATE: 2:00 PM or upon final adjourn./recess Monday, March 11, 2019 PLACE: E1.026 CHAIR: Rep. Dan Flynn HB 1326 Flynn Relating to the continuation and functions of the Texas Military Department. HB 1327 Flynn Relating to the continuation and functions of the Texas Veterans Commission. HB 1328 Flynn Relating to the operations and functions of the Veterans' Land Board and the sunset review date for and programs administered by the board. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
